session_bind_ip.comment: If true, session tokens are bound to the user's IP address. If the IP changes, the token becomes invalid.

session_ttl.comment: The time-to-live (TTL) for a session token, in seconds. After this period, the session token will expire.

otp_session_token.comment: If true, session tokens will be single-use only, meaning they will expire after a single use.

max_login_attempts.comment: The maximum number of allowed login attempts before locking the account. Set to 0 for unlimited login attempts.

https_only.comment: If true, the application will only be accessible over HTTPS, enhancing security by encrypting all communications.
